title: Ben Ryan – the coach behind Fiji’s rugby 7s Olympic gold
description:
Battling cyclones, family deaths, relationship problems, and mysterious magic curses – Ben Ryan’s time in charge of Fiji’s men’s 7s team was truly inspirational. He gives insight into the difficulties he faced and also how he had to develop his own mindset to draw out the best from his players.

LINKS:

Andrew Binner Twitter

Ed Knowles Twitter

Olympic Channel Instagram
